original_text: Now King David was old and advanced in years. And although they covered him with clothes, he could not get warm.
korean_text: 다윗 왕이 나이가 많아 늙으니 이불을 덮어도 따뜻하지 아니한지라

sentences.original_text: Now King David was old and advanced in years.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 다윗 왕은 늙고 나이가 많았더라.

sentences.original_text: although they covered him with clothes
